short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some useful tools to help with CodeCov

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I'm colourblind and CodeCov's new UI made it very hard to view coverage on a PR, so I've created this extension to help with that. There are few bits and pieces to begin with, hopefully I'll be able to extend it when I get the time. Or CodeCov will fix their UI :)

- Highlights covered, uncovered and partially covered lines with colours customisable by the user
- Automatically 'expands' up all files which have uncovered/partially covered lines
- Displays the total of uncovered/partially covered lines in a sidebar
- Links to each uncovered/partially covered line in a sidebar
